Name: blower and heat exchange unit production, decentralized, 180-250 m3/h | blower and heat exchange unit, decentralized, 180-250 m3/h | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/28:Manufacture of machinery and equipment n.e.c./281:Manufacture of general-purpose machinery/2819:Manufacture of other general-purpose machinery
Description: Ventilation unit for decentral ventilation systems with 120 m3/h average air flow. Average of four different ventilation units with 180-250 m3/h maximal air flow considered. Housing mainly made of galvanised steel. Total weight of component 43.1 kg
